name: Declutter Series - DeviantArt GaLGaL
description: Removes everything except llama buttons, on GiveALlamaGetALlama. Faithful in style to unmodified DeviantArt. Compatible with most other themes, including Declutter Series - Deviantart. Designed to be used with the One Click Llama Button script. Part of the Declutter Series.
